reviewText: Awesome!  Very relaxing, great for meditation.  I would've preferred to view the sea life scenes sans the classical music, but it was still very relaxing. There was just a bit of background noise at the beginning, but not all that audible.  I was hoping to use it to relax at work, but I can't sleep on the job!

Seascapes is an excellent video to have around the house.  We use it when we have parties and you want to add to the atmosphere without the TV being the center of attention.

The footage is excellent quality and looks great on the new high def TV.  The kids really love the underwater footage and makes us all want to go back to Hawaii every time we see it.
